title: Fusaka Hard Fork Approaching
description: Ethereum's Fusaka upgrade is scheduled for mainnet activation; ensure client updates to maintain compatibility.
more info: The Fusaka hard fork, following the Pectra upgrade, aims to enhance Ethereum's scalability and efficiency by introducing 12 EIPs. Key features include PeerDAS for data availability sampling, which reduces costs for institutions and improves node performance. This upgrade is crucial for boosting transaction throughput and cutting operational expenses, making Ethereum more accessible for enterprise use.

title: Fusaka Testnet Launch on Sepolia
description: Participate in the Sepolia testnet for Fusaka to prepare for the upcoming hard fork.
more info: The Sepolia testnet is the next phase in testing the Fusaka upgrade, focusing on stability and performance improvements. It allows developers and validators to simulate the mainnet environment, identifying potential issues before full deployment. This step is vital for ensuring a smooth transition and maintaining network integrity.

title: Fusaka Testnet on Hoodi
description: Hoodi testnet activation for Fusaka upgrade; no immediate action required but monitor for updates.
more info: The Hoodi testnet will be the final testing ground before Fusaka's mainnet launch, incorporating feedback from previous testnets. It emphasizes security enhancements and cost reductions, paving the way for broader adoption of Ethereum's layer-2 solutions.

title: Alpenglow Upgrade Proposal
description: Solana's Alpenglow upgrade approved; validators should prepare for implementation.
more info: Alpenglow introduces Votor and Rotor to replace existing consensus mechanisms, aiming for unprecedented speed. Approved by 98.94% of stakeholders, this upgrade could make Solana faster than traditional web services, with a testnet planned for December 2025 and mainnet in Q1 2026.

title: Alpenglow Testnet Deployment
description: Testnet for Solana's Alpenglow upgrade; check for compatibility in dApps.
more info: The Alpenglow testnet at Breakpoint conference will demonstrate enhanced throughput and reduced turbulence. This upgrade addresses past congestion issues, incorporating priority fees and QUIC for better network stability.

title: POL Migration Completion Reminder
description: Ensure all MATIC tokens are migrated to POL to avoid any potential issues.
more info: With 99% of MATIC migrated to POL, this upgrade enhances Polygon's gas and staking capabilities. Holders should use the migration tools to complete the process, ensuring continued utility in the ecosystem.

title: Coinbase POL Upgrade Support
description: Coinbase will support the POL upgrade; review holdings.
more info: Coinbase's support for the POL upgrade from October 14-17 ensures seamless token swaps. This follows the near-complete migration, boosting confidence in Polygon's network evolution.

title: UXLINK Contract Migration
description: Complete UXLINK token migration to new contract to prevent loss.
more info: Bybit and OKX are supporting the UXLINK contract swap, with migrations occurring between September 30 and October 1. Users should ensure deposits are made before deadlines to participate in the automatic swap.

title: Omni to Nomina Token Swap
description: Migrate Omni tokens to Nomina; check wallet compatibility.
more info: The rebrand to Nomina includes a token swap, refreshing the project's vision. All OMNI tokens will be exchanged, with integrations rolling out on exchanges.

title: TOTHEMOON Token Migration
description: N3 to Base token migration open; incentives for early movers.

title: Centrifuge CFG Migration to Ethereum
description: Migrate CFG tokens to Ethereum-based version; trading pauses during process.
more info: All CFG balances will be migrated 1:1 to the new Ethereum token. Funding and trading pause on September 29, resuming post-migration.
